article.headline: Coastal Carolina 75, High Point 58
article.story: CONWAY, S.C. -- Mario Edwards scored 28 points and Chad Gray added 20 to lead Coastal Carolina to an easy 75-58 win over High Point on Saturday. Joseph Harris recorded a double-double with 10 points and 15 rebounds for the Chanticleers (17-3, 7-1 Big South Conference), who had their 12-game winning streak snapped in a 62-52 loss to Radford on Jan. 14. Coastal Carolina never trailed against the Panthers (9-8, 4-3), opening the game with a 22-2 lead. High Point, which shot 33.8 percent (23-for-68) in the game, made only one field goal in the first 11:16 of play. The Chanticleers shot 54.3 percent (25-for-46) from the field. Eugene Harris led the Panthers with 25 points on 9-of-19 shooting from the floor and 4 of 9 from beyond the 3-point line. Corey Law finished with 10 points and eight rebounds. Kierre Greenwood had 10 points for Coastal Carolina.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
